7 class utilFunction
8 {
9 public:
10 
20 Eigen::Vector4d computeForcePerLeg(std::vector<std::string> contact_points, Eigen::VectorXd forces, bool print_debug=false)
21 {
22  int vector_pos = 0; //vector position
23  int i=0;
24  Eigen::Vector4d leg_force;
25 
26  for(auto contact_pt:contact_points)
27  {
28  //compute the magnitude for each leg
29  leg_force[i] = sqrt(forces.block(vector_pos, 0, 3, 1).array().square().sum());
30  if(print_debug) ROS_INFO("Force on frame %s is %lf", contact_pt.c_str(), leg_force[i]);
31 
32  vector_pos +=3;
33  i++;
34 
35  }
36  if(print_debug) ROS_INFO("Total Force: %f", leg_force.array().sum());
37 
38  return leg_force;
39 }
40 
48 Eigen::VectorXd twistToVector(geometry_msgs::Twist msg)
49 {
50  Eigen::VectorXd vel_vec(6);
51  vel_vec << msg.linear.x, msg.linear.y, msg.linear.z,
52  msg.angular.x, msg.angular.y, msg.angular.z;
53 
54  return vel_vec;
55 }
56 
64 Eigen::VectorXd poseToVector(geometry_msgs::Pose msg)
65 {
66  Eigen::VectorXd pos_vec(7);
67  pos_vec << msg.position.x, msg.position.y, msg.position.z,
68  msg.orientation.x, msg.orientation.y, msg.orientation.z, msg.orientation.w;
69 
70  return pos_vec;
71 }
72 
80 std::vector<float> eigenToStlVector(Eigen::VectorXd vec)
81 {
82  // std::vector<float> stl_vec;
83  std::vector<float> stl_vec(vec.data(), vec.data() + vec.rows() * vec.cols());
84  return stl_vec;
85 }
86 
96 void vectorToForceMsg(std::vector<std::string> contact_points, Eigen::VectorXd force_vector, aliengo_dynamics_computer::ReactionForce& leg_forces)
97 {
98  geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped single_leg_force;
99  single_leg_force.header.stamp = ros::Time().now();
100 
101  int vector_pos = 0; //vector position
102  for(auto contact_pt:contact_points)
103  {
104  //this frame doesn't exist in ROS. But refers to the frame in the pinocchio model
105  single_leg_force.header.frame_id = contact_pt;
106 
107  Eigen::Vector3d force_component = force_vector.block(vector_pos, 0, 3, 1);
108 
109  single_leg_force.wrench.force.x = force_component(0,0);
110  single_leg_force.wrench.force.y = force_component(1,0);
111  single_leg_force.wrench.force.z = force_component(2,0);
112 
113  leg_forces.reaction_forces.push_back(single_leg_force);
114  }
115 }
116 
117 };
